854063 THE BENGAL, AGRA AND ASSAM CIVIL COURTS ACT, 1887
ACT NO. 12 OF 1887 1 AN ACT TO CONSOLIDATE AND AMEND THE LAW RELATING TO CI VIL COURTSIN BENGAL [ 11th March, 1887.]
WHEREAS it is expedient to consolidate and amend the law relating to Civil Courts in Bengal, the North- Western Provinces and Assam; It is hereby enacted as follows:-
